title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 831.9 - Custody and availability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 831.9 - Custody and availability

State Regulations

The comprehensive plan shall be and remain in the custody
of the executive director. The plan, including all maps, charts, descriptions
and supporting data shall be and remain a public record open to examination
during the regular business hours of the commission, under such safeguards as
the executive director may determine to be necessary to preserve and protect
the plan against loss, damage or destruction. Copies of the comprehensive plan
or any part or parts thereof shall be made available by the executive director
for public sale at a price covering the cost of production and
distribution. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
831.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
